elements.title: lang::report_1_user_summary::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT 
    u.id AS u_id,
    u.firstname,
    u.lastname,
    c.id AS c_id,
    c.fullname AS c_fullname,
    u.email,
    u.lastaccess,
    u.timecreated,
    ROUND(
        AVG(
            CASE
                WHEN g.rawgrademax > 0
                THEN (g.finalgrade / g.rawgrademax) * 100
                ELSE g.finalgrade 
            END
        ), 0
    ) AS g_finalgrade,
    MAX(ca.completed_activities) AS ca_completed_activities
FROM 
    mdl_course c
JOIN 
    mdl_context ctx ON ctx.instanceid = c.id
JOIN 
    mdl_role_assignments ra ON ra.contextid = ctx.id
                            AND ra.roleid = 5
JOIN 
    mdl_user u ON u.id = ra.userid
LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT 
            COUNT(id) AS completed_activities, 
            userid
        FROM 
            mdl_course_modules_completion
        WHERE 
            id > 1
            AND completionstate IN (1, 2)
        GROUP BY 
            userid
    ) ca ON ca.userid = u.id
LEFT JOIN 
    mdl_grade_items gi ON gi.courseid = c.id 
                       AND gi.itemtype = 'course'
LEFT JOIN 
    mdl_grade_grades g ON g.itemid = gi.id 
                      AND g.userid = u.id 
                      AND g.finalgrade IS NOT NULL
WHERE u.id        > 1
  AND u.deleted   = 0
  AND u.suspended = 0
  AND u.username != 'guest'
GROUP BY u.id
